instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: Ahhh! Who are you? I don't know you! Stranger danger! Stranger danger!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: Wait, It's okay Rana, You're not a little girl anymore. Just take a deep breath and introduce yourself!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: Hiya! My name Is Rana! I like frogs and crocheting and stuff and I live here in Sunroot with my auntie Felina! ^_^

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: But I haven't seen you around. And I've met everyone in Sunroot so you must be from like, Really far away! Are you an adventurer or something?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: I think it'd be fun to go on an adventure but idk if my auntie would ever let me. V_V
